Case 1:08-cr-00363-SHS Document 363 Filed 06/25/19 Page 12 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By: /s/ A. Marie Villapania
A. MARIE VILLAPAÑA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/29/07
/s/ Jeffrey Epstein
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00005541

text_blocks.content: By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a signed addendum to a non-prosecution agreement. The document is dated October 30, 2007, and signed by Jeffrey Epstein and A. Marie Villapania. The document also includes the names of other individuals involved in the case, including R. Alexander Acosta, Gerald Lefcourt, and Lilly Ann Sanchez.
